name: nx-remotecache-minio
description: Remote caching for @nrwl/nx using Minio Storage

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp README.md dist/README.md && cp CHANGELOG.md dist/CHANGELOG.md
scripts.release: pnpm run build && cd dist && pnpm publish && cd ..
scripts.local-release: pnpm run build && cd dist && pnpm publish --registry=http://localhost:4873/ && cd ..
scripts.link: pnpm run build && cd dist && pnpm link && cd ..

author: Niklas Portmann
